        Returns:

        public static java.lang.String boardToString(char[][] b)
        A helper method which converts a 2D array of characters into a single String
        Parameters:
        b - the 2D array of characters representing the current game configuration which are converted to a single String
        Returns:
        the concatenation of all the values of b

      • isWin

        public static boolean isWin(char[][] b)
        A method which determines if a given board configuration represented by a 2D array of characters contains a win.
        Parameters:
        b - the 2D array of characters to be evaluated
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no

      • isWin

        public static boolean isWin(java.lang.String s)
        A method which determines if a given board configuration represented by a String contains a win by converting it to a 2D array of characters and evaluating that.
        Parameters:
        s - the String to be converted and evaluated
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no
